resources.string: How much water did you drink today?
Selected date cannot be greater than current date
You have exceed your allow amount of protein, doing so you will not get the best results
You can not select more than 10 images at a time
Please select atleast one water / beverages
This feature will be implemented in next milestone
Please enter minimum 6 character in new password.
Please remove blank space from password.
Do you want to add another portion ?
You have exceeded add food limit by 10. You can not add more food now.
Sleeping hours can not be greater than 24 hours
There is no nutriscriptions. Please add nutriscriptoins.
Please add picture from gallery or camera.
There is no breakfast value. Please add breakfast.
There is no lunch value. Please add lunch.
There is no dinner value. Please add dinner.
There is no snacks value. Please add snacks.
